definition: characteristic of or suffering from kyphosis, an abnormality of the vertebral column, a person whose back is hunched because of abnormal curvature of the upper spine
details:
adjective
- characteristic of or suffering from kyphosis, an abnormality of the vertebral column
= synonyms: gibbous
noun
- a person whose back is hunched because of abnormal curvature of the upper spine
= synonyms: humpback
